bike.description: 6061 aluminum main tubes, over-sized seat tube, zero-stack head tube, over-sized stays, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: RST Blaze 650 MLO, MCU/coil spring with mechanical lock-out, external preload adjustor, 30mm stanchions, 100mm travel
Zero-stack internal cup threadless, 25mm shim stack, 1 1/8"
Alex TD26 650B rims, 32H, alloy 6-bolt disc hubs, 14g black stainless steel spokes
Shimano Acera M360 rear and M190 front
SR Suntour XCC-T102 alloy crank arms, 42/34/24T rings, 170mm (15") 175mm (17"-21")
ATB platform, hi-impact resin cage & body
Tektro Novela mechanical disc brakes with 6" rotors and Shimano levers
Jamis XC riser, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 13mm rise x 620mm
Jamis XC alloy threadless, 10JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 90mm (15"), 100mm (1-19"), 110mm (21")
Jamis ATB Sport with pressure relief channel, SL cover, protective front and rear guards
